name: Cleatus MILTON-EL, Sui Juris Priority Claimant/Injured Party, Petitioner v. Superintendent, SCI-Albion Michael HARLOW; Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and District Attorney of Philadelphia County Seth Williams, Respondents

parties: Cleatus MILTON-EL, Sui Juris Priority Claimant/Injured Party, Petitioner v. Superintendent, SCI-Albion Michael HARLOW; Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and District Attorney of Philadelphia County Seth Williams, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of July, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and the Application for an Evidentiary Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
48 A.3d 1244
Cleatus MILTON-EL, Sui Juris Priority Claimant/Injured Party, Petitioner v. Superintendent, SCI-Albion Michael HARLOW; Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and District Attorney of Philadelphia County Seth Williams, Respondents.
No. 87 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 19, 2012.
